Uses of Interface
org.bitcoinj.wallet.KeyChainGroupStructure

  • Packages that use KeyChainGroupStructure 
    Package Description
    org.bitcoinj.kits
    High level wrapper APIs around the bitcoinj building blocks.
    org.bitcoinj.wallet
    Classes that support the Wallet, which knows how to find and save transactions relevant to a set of keys or scripts, calculate balances, and spend money: the wallet has many features and can be extended in various ways, please refer to the website for documentation on how to use it.

    • Uses of KeyChainGroupStructure in org.bitcoinj.kits

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Creates a new WalletAppKit, with the given Context.
      WalletAppKit(NetworkParameters params, Script.ScriptType preferredOutputScriptType, KeyChainGroupStructure structure, File directory, String filePrefix)
      Creates a new WalletAppKit, with a newly created Context.

    • Uses of KeyChainGroupStructure in org.bitcoinj.wallet

      Default KeyChainGroupStructure implementation.
      Methods in org.bitcoinj.wallet with parameters of type KeyChainGroupStructure 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static KeyChainGroup.Builder KeyChainGroup.builder(NetworkParameters params, KeyChainGroupStructure structure) 
      ListenableFuture<List<Transaction>> Wallet.doMaintenance(KeyChainGroupStructure structure, org.bouncycastle.crypto.params.KeyParameter aesKey, boolean signAndSend)
      A wallet app should call this from time to time in order to let the wallet craft and send transactions needed to re-organise coins internally.
      static Wallet Wallet.fromSeed(NetworkParameters params, DeterministicSeed seed, Script.ScriptType outputScriptType, KeyChainGroupStructure structure) 
      void Wallet.upgradeToDeterministic(Script.ScriptType outputScriptType, KeyChainGroupStructure structure, org.bouncycastle.crypto.params.KeyParameter aesKey)
      Upgrades the wallet to be deterministic (BIP32).
      void KeyChainGroup.upgradeToDeterministic(Script.ScriptType preferredScriptType, KeyChainGroupStructure structure, long keyRotationTimeSecs, org.bouncycastle.crypto.params.KeyParameter aesKey)
      This method will upgrade the wallet along the following path: Basic --> P2PKH --> P2WPKH
